main.headline: I'm Alex Ifrimenco.
main.name: Alex Ifrimenco
main.description: Software Engineer with a passion for building quality software. Team player. Proactive and getting-things-done attitude
main.bio: I've been passionate about Technology, Science and Astronomy since I know myself. As my passion grew, so did my problem-solving skills and mindset. In middle school I used to repair neighbors' computers for snack money. Being born in a village near Focsani, Romania, I went afterwards to study Computer Science at the University of Bucharest. With the passing of time, another passion grew in me, the one to help the world. From delivering quality software to planting trees.
main.contactmessage: Warning! Contact form not yet implemented. Please contact me at ifrimenco.alex@gmail.com

education.description: Learned about programming and mathematical concepts, such as Algorithmics, OOP, Full Stack Development Artificial Intelligence. Worked with various languages and frameworks, including C, C++, C#, Python, JavaScript and HTML/CSS.
Participated in various algorithmic contests during high school.

work.title: DevOps Engineer
work.description: Currently building infrastructures for the Farming 4.0 Use Case of the AI-SPRINT project, which is backed up by the european comission

work.title: .NET Developer
work.description: Contributed to the World Health Organization COVID-19 Vaccine Distribution Platform (WHO ACT) which has helped the organization deliver over 1 billion COVID-19 vaccines to the world. Architected and built a production deployed system for a large financial sector client in Romania. The system mapped web application URLs to SEO friendly ones with the posibility of configuring certain SEO specific tags.

volunteering.organization: Mathematics and Computer Science Students Association - ASMI
volunteering.title: Human Resources & Fundraising Volunteer
volunteering.description: Helped with virtually everything, including recruiting, fundraising and organizing events.

volunteering.title: Workshop Tutor
volunteering.description: Held a workshop for children at the CodeKids 2021 Fest. The workshop consisted in developing an application in Scratch and playing the game "Robot, Make me a Sandwich!"

volunteering.title: Project Manager
volunteering.description: Organized with the help of ASMI an online conference where important Alumni from the Faculty Of Mathematics and Computer Science, including BitDefender's CTO and Romania's Cyberint Centre Chief told their success stories to the students of the faculty.

volunteering.organization: Lucky Trinkets - Foster Care Vrancea County
volunteering.title: Volunteer
volunteering.description: A stand was setup in a mall where people could donate and receive a spring trinket crafted by the children and tutors from Foster Care. My main role was to convince the passers-by to donate money and receive a trinket.

projects.title: MeCrypt
projects.category: My Bachelor Thesis, an Encrypted Messaging Application
